title: High Ping || Need help
body: I usually have 60 ping but in a few days my ping started to be constantly on 150-200, this is the only game that i lag and i contacted my network company and they say its fine. Please Help me!

replies.body: You could be suffering from packet loss caused by some local network problem.  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to find out what exactly is going on.  The results will also give you a set of troubleshooting steps to assist with your specific case.  Let me know what you find.
